tokens.text: drinks milk to clear status effects

generated_doNotEdit.title: Drink Milk Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the mob to drink milk based on specified environment conditions.

fields.title: Cooldown Seconds
fields.description: Time (in seconds) that the goal is on cooldown before it can be used again.

fields.title: Filters
fields.description: Conditions that need to be met for the behavior to start.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
